title: Fix language aggregation in repo analyzer
description: agentforge/core/repo_analyzer.py uses a dict comprehension to map extensions to language counts, which overwrites counts when multiple extensions map to the same language (e.g., .py and .pyi). Replace with a summing approach so language counts are accurate.

title: Harden spec parsing and validation
description: agentforge/core/spec_parser.py only parses '# ' headings, ignores preamble text, and does not validate required sections or handle missing files. Add input validation, clearer errors, and support for expected sections.

title: Align agent schema with agent.md.j2 template fields
description: agentforge/templates/agent.md.j2 expects exclusions and communication_style, but agent_generator only enforces name/role/responsibilities/constraints. Decide on canonical agent schema, update validation and template accordingly, and document required/optional fields.

title: Implement CLI command dispatch for generate/run
description: agentforge/cli.py currently prints 'Not implemented yet' for both subcommands. Define CLI args (spec path, output dir, agent file, task input, context), wire to core functions, and return non-zero on errors.

title: Exclude beads metadata from repo analysis
description: agentforge/core/repo_analyzer.py _IGNORE_DIRS omits .beads, so repo metrics include bead artifacts. Add .beads to ignored directories to avoid skewing counts.

title: Add unit tests for core modules
description: No tests exist for CLI/core behavior. Add tests covering repo_analyzer, spec_parser, prompt_builder, and executor error handling (mocked).

title: Add error handling/timeout for codex execution
description: agentforge/core/executor.py calls 'codex' with check=True but does not surface stderr, handle missing binary, or enforce timeouts. Add explicit error handling, timeouts, and clearer exceptions for CLI output.

title: Build agent generation workflow and template rendering
description: agentforge/core/agent_generator.py only validates JSON output. Implement end-to-end flow: parse spec, analyze repo, generate agents, render agent.md.j2 (likely via Jinja2), and write files to output directory. Add Jinja2 dependency if needed.
